name: v0.6.0
body:
## Using MODULE.bazel:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_fuzzing", version = "0.6.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_fuzzing",
    sha256 = "e4b0329bb6335689d03961549a8227192cc6bf9458b20b07cbd735ec5c58e7d7",
    strip_prefix = "rules_fuzzing-v0.6.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/releases/download/v0.6.0/rules_fuzzing-v0.6.0.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_fuzzing//fuzzing:repositories.bzl", "rules_fuzzing_dependencies")

rules_fuzzing_dependencies()

load("@rules_fuzzing//fuzzing:init.bzl", "rules_fuzzing_init")

rules_fuzzing_init()

load("@fuzzing_py_deps//:requirements.bzl", "install_deps")

install_deps()
```


## What's Changed
* Update CODEOWNERS by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_fuzzing/pull/266
* Propagate tags and target_compatible_with to generated bazel targets by @simonresch in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_fuzzing/pull/262
* chore: Configure Renovate by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_fuzzing/pull/256
* Update Bazel and runners by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_fuzzing/pull/272
* Disable renovate by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_fuzzing/pull/273
* Fix "undefined variable" error if `JAVA_HOME` is undefined by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_fuzzing/pull/265
* Add `@simonresch` to CODEOWNERS by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_fuzzing/pull/274
* Add BCR publishing workflow by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_fuzzing/pull/275
* Fix release_prep.sh by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_fuzzing/pull/276
* Fix source.template.json by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_fuzzing/pull/277
* Fix source.template.json again by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_fuzzing/pull/278
* Improve workflow triggers by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_fuzzing/pull/279

## New Contributors
* @renovate[bot] made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_fuzzing/pull/256

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_fuzzing/compare/v0.5.3...v0.6.0

name: Release v0.5.3 (2025-02-18)
body:
## What's Changed
* fix(replayer): replay corpus files in hidden dirs by @simonresch in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_fuzzing/pull/254
* Add aliases for OSS-Fuzz engines by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_fuzzing/pull/258
* Update Jazzer and Bazel by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_fuzzing/pull/260
* Mark extension as reproducible by @cerisier in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_fuzzing/pull/261

## New Contributors
* @simonresch made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_fuzzing/pull/254
* @cerisier made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_fuzzing/pull/261

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_fuzzing/compare/v0.5.2...v0.5.3

name: Release v0.5.2 (2024-05-14)
body:
## What's Changed
* Fix incompatibility with Bazel 6 by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/pull/248
* Update metadata.template.json with correct email by @stefanbucur in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/pull/247
* Make fmeum the BCR maintainer by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/pull/249
* Update rules_python to 0.28.0 by @mering in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/pull/250

## New Contributors
* @mering made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/pull/250

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/compare/v0.5.1...v0.5.2

name: Release v0.5.1 (2024-03-27)
body:

* Add metadata for "Publish to BCR" app by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/pull/246


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/compare/v0.5.0...v0.5.1

name: Release v0.5.0 (2024-03-27)
body:
## What's Changed
* Fix import to include full path by @acozzette in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/pull/238
* Update pip_parse invocation by @tpudlik in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/pull/240
* Update to Bazel 7 by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/pull/241
* Add support for Bzlmod by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/pull/242

## New Contributors
* @acozzette made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/pull/238
* @tpudlik made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/pull/240

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/compare/v0.4.1...v0.5.0

name: Release v0.4.1 (2023-10-19)
body:
## What's Changed
* Fix `main_class` error in `java_fuzz_test` by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/pull/236
* Update abseil-cpp to fix build with Clang >=16 by @robinlinden in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/pull/237

## New Contributors
* @robinlinden made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/pull/237

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/compare/v0.4.0...v0.4.1

## Workspace Setup

```python
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_fuzzing",
    sha256 = "ff52ef4845ab00e95d29c02a9e32e9eff4e0a4c9c8a6bcf8407a2f19eb3f9190",
    strip_prefix = "rules_fuzzing-0.4.1",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/releases/download/v0.4.1/rules_fuzzing-0.4.1.zip"],
)

load("@rules_fuzzing//fuzzing:repositories.bzl", "rules_fuzzing_dependencies")

rules_fuzzing_dependencies()

load("@rules_fuzzing//fuzzing:init.bzl", "rules_fuzzing_init")

rules_fuzzing_init()

load("@fuzzing_py_deps//:requirements.bzl", "install_deps")

install_deps()
```

name: Release v0.4.0 (2023-09-10)
body:
## What's Changed
* Update the RE2 example to the latest version. by @stefanbucur in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/pull/211
* Remove libFuzzer stub source file by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/pull/213
* Use Bazel's default `PATH` when running Python actions by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/pull/217
* Do not deviate from UBSan default for local fuzzing by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/pull/219
* Add coverage support to C++ regression tests by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/pull/212
* Fix memory leak in Java runfiles tests by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/pull/220
* Update bazel to 5.4.0 by @keith in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/pull/226
* Update rules_python and use new deps installer by @keith in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/pull/225
* Update honggfuzz to 2.5 by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/pull/229
* Update and simplify Jazzer integration by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/pull/218
* Apply buildifier lint fixes by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/pull/233
* Add `asan-ubsan` instrumentation option by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/pull/231
* Update Jazzer to v0.20.1 by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/pull/232

## New Contributors
* @keith made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/pull/226

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/compare/v0.3.2...v0.4.0

## Workspace Setup

```python
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_fuzzing",
    sha256 = "c0dc1f90dea236299271e558d8303dd4cc8c7554b2b0639561e5007d2d33328e",
    strip_prefix = "rules_fuzzing-0.4.0",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/archive/v0.4.0.zip"],
)

load("@rules_fuzzing//fuzzing:repositories.bzl", "rules_fuzzing_dependencies")

rules_fuzzing_dependencies()

load("@rules_fuzzing//fuzzing:init.bzl", "rules_fuzzing_init")

rules_fuzzing_init()

load("@fuzzing_py_deps//:requirements.bzl", "install_deps")

install_deps()
```

name: Release v0.3.2 (2022-08-31)
body:
## What's Changed
* Update rules_python to 0.6.0 by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/pull/199
* Update the README to point to latest release. by @stefanbucur in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/pull/197
* Fix bazel_lint job by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/pull/205
* Support "size" and "timeout" on *_fuzz_test by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/pull/204
* Update CODEOWNERS by @stefanbucur in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/pull/209
* Appease unused variable warnings in libfuzzer_stub.cc by @matta in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/pull/210
* Bump up rules_python to v0.11 by @stefanbucur in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/pull/208

## New Contributors
* @matta made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/pull/210

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/compare/v0.3.1...v0.3.2

## Workspace setup

```python
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_fuzzing",
    sha256 = "d9002dd3cd6437017f08593124fdd1b13b3473c7b929ceb0e60d317cb9346118",
    strip_prefix = "rules_fuzzing-0.3.2",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/archive/v0.3.2.zip"],
)

load("@rules_fuzzing//fuzzing:repositories.bzl", "rules_fuzzing_dependencies")

rules_fuzzing_dependencies()

load("@rules_fuzzing//fuzzing:init.bzl", "rules_fuzzing_init")

rules_fuzzing_init()
```

name: Release v0.3.1 (2022-01-24)
body:
## What's Changed

Bug fix release:
* Pin Bazel to 4.2.2 by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/pull/194
* Fix native library handling by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/pull/195
* Improve CI setup by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/pull/196


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/compare/v0.3.0...v0.3.1

## Workspace setup

```python
    name = "rules_fuzzing",
    sha256 = "23bb074064c6f488d12044934ab1b0631e8e6898d5cf2f6bde087adb01111573",
    strip_prefix = "rules_fuzzing-0.3.1",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/archive/v0.3.1.zip"],

load("@rules_fuzzing//fuzzing:repositories.bzl", "rules_fuzzing_dependencies")

rules_fuzzing_dependencies()

load("@rules_fuzzing//fuzzing:init.bzl", "rules_fuzzing_init")

rules_fuzzing_init()
```

name: Release v0.3.0 (2022-01-19)
body:
A couple of additions and improvements, thanks to @fmeum, including:

* UBSan is now a supported instrumentation for local fuzzing and regression testing (#187)
* The rules are tested to be compatible with GCC (#177).
* Jazzer and Abseil dependency updates.

## Workspace setup

```python
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_fuzzing",
    sha256 = "9119103fad9c3de30900ec3d37c1e8327fa06c033558070c0f6a159921670ff8",
    strip_prefix = "rules_fuzzing-0.3.0",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/archive/v0.3.0.zip"],
)

load("@rules_fuzzing//fuzzing:repositories.bzl", "rules_fuzzing_dependencies")

rules_fuzzing_dependencies()

load("@rules_fuzzing//fuzzing:init.bzl", "rules_fuzzing_init")

rules_fuzzing_init()
```

name: Release v0.2.0 (2021-07-12)
body:
## New features

Major feature: Java fuzzing support through Jazzer (thank you @fmeum for the great contributions!).

Other features and fixes:
* Runfiles support in OSS-Fuzz packaging builds.
* Improved dictionary validation (#140).
* Support for OSS-Fuzz option files in fuzz tests. (#148).
* Various smaller tweaks and fixes (thanks @xinhaoyuan and @fmeum).

## Workspace setup

```python
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_fuzzing",
    sha256 = "127d7c45e9b7520b3c42145b3cb1b8c26477cdaed0521b02a0298907339fefa1",
    strip_prefix = "rules_fuzzing-0.2.0",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/archive/v0.2.0.zip"],
)

load("@rules_fuzzing//fuzzing:repositories.bzl", "rules_fuzzing_dependencies")

rules_fuzzing_dependencies()

load("@rules_fuzzing//fuzzing:init.bzl", "rules_fuzzing_init")

rules_fuzzing_init()
```

name: Release v0.1.3 (2021-04-01)
body:
## New features

This is a bug fix release:

* Make sure the staging dir in OSS-Fuzz packaging rule is cleaned up, to permit non-sandboxed runs. (#134)

## Workspace setup

```python
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_fuzzing",
    sha256 = "94f25c7a18db0502ace26a3ef7d0a25fd7c195c4e9770ddd1b1ec718e8936091",
    strip_prefix = "rules_fuzzing-0.1.3",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_fuzzing/archive/v0.1.3.zip"],
)

load("@rules_fuzzing//fuzzing:repositories.bzl", "rules_fuzzing_dependencies")

rules_fuzzing_dependencies()

load("@rules_fuzzing//fuzzing:init.bzl", "rules_fuzzing_init")

rules_fuzzing_init()
```

name: Release v0.1.0 (2021-02-05)
body:
## New features

This is the first release of the fuzzing rules. See the README file for all features currently supported.

## WORKSPACE setup
